children.value: Currently working for Rijk Zwaan, a global leader in vegetable seed production. I have created and maintained more than 15 applications for various department, using Traditional Web, Reactive and Mobile. I have faced many exciting technical challenges and learned to work effectively in a SCRUM environment. I value my team members and our collaborative approach to ensure code quality and clear roles.

Building upon my basic IT support knowledge, I started to develop a solid foundation of technical skills and customer service as consultant at Rijk Zwaan. Some of the advanced topics I have learned include MobileIron, a mobile device management tool and Ivanti Automation, which can be provision and automate software. I have also supported Rijk Zwaan's users with various technical issues and enjoyed the personal contact with them. One of my achievements was managing a project to migrate laptops to Windows 10. Additionally, I gained experience in troubleshooting and writing documentation for IT systems and procedures.
Helped migrating 1500 users of Zuidwester to Office365. Supporting and managing different aspects of IT, like workplace management.

I had the opportunity to intern at Masters that matter, a foundation that works on solving social problems. My main project was 'COMMUNITY PLASTICS', which involved collecting and processing plastic waste from the local community. I experimented with different ways of transforming the plastic into new and beautiful products, which I designed myself. I also established a network of local sources for the plastic materials, and created a brand identity for 'COMMUNITY PLASTICS'.
